subject: Order No. SSN4240
description_text:
Hi,

 I ordered simsonn plus x clutch at the same time I preordered the HS Pro shifter.

The order shows both items as being delivered:

Will I get sent a copy of the tracking for the HS pro shifter when it is dispatched?

Regards Ben 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi ben barrett,     We will send HS Pro out this week.
